attributes.action: Hold Ryan air responsible for cancelled flight that effected UK residents
attributes.background: Ryanair is to tell 400,000 passengers that their flight has been cancelled, after it admitted to a “mess-up” on pilot holidays that left 18 million ticket holders wondering if their holiday plans would be ruined.

rejection.details:
Airlines are regulated by the Civil Aviation Authority, which is independent. 

You can find out how to make a complaint here:

https://www.caa.co.uk/Passengers/Resolving-travel-problems/How-the-CAA-can-help/How-to-make-a-complaint/
